scripts.remote-compose-down: export SERVER_ADDR=`grep SERVER_ADDR  .env | cut -d '=' -f 2-`;  docker-compose -H 'ssh://root@'$SERVER_ADDR down
scripts.remote-compose-up: export SERVER_ADDR=`grep SERVER_ADDR  .env | cut -d '=' -f 2-`; docker-compose -H 'ssh://root@'$SERVER_ADDR up -d
scripts.compose-build: webpack && export SERVER_ADDR=`grep SERVER_ADDR  .env | cut -d '=' -f 2-`;  docker-compose -H 'ssh://root@'$SERVER_ADDR build --no-cache
